name: Repairing Herpo Thicknesse Umbridge's Horcrux
description:
In this adventure you must repair the "Horcrux".  Instead of destroying it, you shall  resurrect the dark lord that came after voldemort and was defeated. You shall repair this horcrux with the "Elder Wand". However, you must repair the horcrux as fast as you can because after some time, you will die because of its curse if it remains unrepaired.

Credits:

  • Halit GÜLMEZ: Master of Dark Arts (Game Artist)
  • Adnan ÇIĞTEKİN: Magic Developer (Developer)
